about_the_game:
Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks ("PFT") invites you to delve into an exciting community-created modification for Portal 2, brought to life by a dedicated solo developer and fellow Portal 2 enthusiast. Step into the shoes of Rachel, an intrepid test subject, as she embarks on a thrilling journey guided by the endearing personality core named "SAIC," through the enigmatic Forbidden Testing Track, Codename: "Quebeck Seven."

Features

Enhanced Gameplay

Prepare for an enhanced Portal 2 experience as PFT introduces a range of exciting features that will spice up your gameplay, including a variety of inventive weapons and test elements that will truly put your puzzle-solving skills to the test.

Weapons

  • Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device - Portal gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Paint Spreading Device - Paint gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator - Gravity gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Long Reaching Object Dissolving Device - Fizzler gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Time Manipulation device - Time gun

Test Elements


  • Aperture Science Electrodynamic Levitation and Kinetic Ejection Apparatus - Electro catapult
  • Aperture Science Spatial Conduit Doorway - Portal door
  • Aperture Science Dynamically Engaged Explosive Containment Apparatus - Exploding box
  • Aperture Science Aerial Levitation Ventilation System - Vent
  • Aperture Science Quantum Annihilation Beam - Blue laser
  • Aperture Science Turret-Dependent Activation Mechanism - Turret button
  • Aperture Science Chrono Control Button Array - Time Button set
  • Aperture Science Interdimensional Passage Gate - Dimension door
  • Aperture Science Laser Refraction Gel - Reflection Gel

New Maps, Voice Lines and Soundtrack

Prepare to explore over 30 carefully designed new maps, accompanied by an engaging soundtrack featuring more than 30 music tracks. Dive deeper into the experience with over 150 new voice lines that bring additional life and personality to your adventure.

Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks ("PFT") invites you to delve into an exciting community-created modification for Portal 2, brought to life by a dedicated solo developer and fellow Portal 2 enthusiast. Step into the shoes of Rachel, an intrepid test subject, as she embarks on a thrilling journey guided by the endearing personality core named "SAIC," through the enigmatic Forbidden Testing Track, Codename: "Quebeck Seven."

Features

Enhanced Gameplay

Prepare for an enhanced Portal 2 experience as PFT introduces a range of exciting features that will spice up your gameplay, including a variety of inventive weapons and test elements that will truly put your puzzle-solving skills to the test.

Weapons

  • Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device - Portal gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Paint Spreading Device - Paint gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator - Gravity gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Long Reaching Object Dissolving Device - Fizzler gun
  • Aperture Science Handheld Time Manipulation device - Time gun

Test Elements


  • Aperture Science Electrodynamic Levitation and Kinetic Ejection Apparatus - Electro catapult
  • Aperture Science Spatial Conduit Doorway - Portal door
  • Aperture Science Dynamically Engaged Explosive Containment Apparatus - Exploding box
  • Aperture Science Aerial Levitation Ventilation System - Vent
  • Aperture Science Quantum Annihilation Beam - Blue laser
  • Aperture Science Turret-Dependent Activation Mechanism - Turret button
  • Aperture Science Chrono Control Button Array - Time Button set
  • Aperture Science Interdimensional Passage Gate - Dimension door
  • Aperture Science Laser Refraction Gel - Reflection Gel

New Maps, Voice Lines and Soundtrack

Prepare to explore over 30 carefully designed new maps, accompanied by an engaging soundtrack featuring more than 30 music tracks. Dive deeper into the experience with over 150 new voice lines that bring additional life and personality to your adventure.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Something out of the century

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Something out of the century

name: Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Something out of the century

short_description: Portal: Forbidden Testing Tracks invites you to delve into an exciting community-created modification for Portal 2. Step into the shoes of Rachel as she embarks on a journey guided by the personality core named "SAIC," through the Forbidden Testing Track, Codename: "Quebeck Seven."
